name: Pahua
desc: A fitness equipment merchant and a fitness coach from the Collective of Plenty.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
As a fitness coach, Pahua places great importance on warm-ups before any formal training session, a habit she carries over into her Genius Invokation TCG matches as well...
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents
customize.desc:
Abyss Herald: Wicked Torrents

The world shall be severed, and all shall be obliterated.

customize.name: Electro Hypostasis
customize.desc:
Electro Hypostasis

Code name: Aleph. A high-purity Electro entity.

Even if you win at rock-paper-scissors, Aleph is not one to admit defeat.

customize.name: Dvalin
customize.desc:
"Dragon of the East" Dvalin

"How wonderful it would have been if you were as I, witnessing your noble, beautiful form as you soared through the blue sky."

"Then you would know that this sky and this earth are both things worth fighting for."

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>
